text:
When a Mac OS 10 client uploads a file to the slide server, it creates 3 items 
in the slide file system.  A ".Trashes" folder on the root, a ".file" and 
finally the "file" itself. 

Please add a 'hide-dot-files' option to the configuration file.  So the webdav 
servlet will filter those "." files and folders.

On a side note..it would be nice if a configurable list of prefixes and 
suffixes where added to that filtering system.

Thanks,
Neo
creator: neo@somd.net
